channel.title: Can you get ancients in moparscape?
channel.description:
Hi there...I was wondering if you can get ancients in moparscape sicne i have seem servers that had ancients. If you can how can I do it? And how I switch my spell list.
Thanks for reading.

item.title: Can you get ancients in moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

Add this in client.java in your server folder. (don’t ask me where… figure it out yourself…)

if (objectID == 6552) { animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }
Then just add an ancient alter, and it should change your mage.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you get ancients in moparscape?
